main_definition: Insects are a class of invertebrates within the phylum Arthropoda, characterized by a three-part body (head, thorax, abdomen), six legs, and often wings. They play vital roles in ecosystems as pollinators, decomposers, and food sources for other animals.

meanings_and_examples.example: When there are so many problems to solve, it feels like we're dealing with a swarm of insects.
The store sold out of the popular item in just an hour; it was as if they were bugs buying it up.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who is annoying, bothersome, or persistent
meanings_and_examples.example: Her constant complaints about work became a real nuisance to everyone around her.
